entry.tran: （依附于大建筑物的）披屋，披棚，单坡屋顶小房
entry.def: A lean-to is a building such as a shed or garage which is attached to one wall of a larger building, and which usually has a sloping roof.

means.word_mean: 1. rough shelter whose roof has only one slope
